All Classes

Class Description
AttackAction
Special Action for attacking other Actors.
AttackBehaviour
This class represents the behaviour to attack others around in the surrounding
Behaviour
This class is the interface for all behaviours that will be developed
BreakShellAction
This class is used to destroy the shell of the Koopa
Coin
Coin class that extends abstract class currency Capabilities: Picking up a coin should increase the Player's wallet balance.
ConsumeAction
Consume action consumes special items
Currency
Class of Currency items
CurrencyCollector
Class of currency collectors that extends Actor
Dirt
A class that represents bare dirt.
Enemy
This class is the generic class for an enemy class that would form the base for all enemies moving forwards
Floor
A class that represents the floor inside a building.
FollowBehaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
Goomba
A little fungus guy.
Growable
interface method implemented by tree subclasses.
HighGround
This class is responsible for any grounds which are high grounds
JumpAction
Jump Action jumps onto high grounds
Koopa
This class represents the Turtle enemy known as the Koopa which is a regular enemy in the Mario universe.
Mature
Tree's third stage
Monologue
This class represents the generic Monologue that is used to deliver speech lines
Monologue_Toad
This class represents the Monologue that is used by Toad to deliver speech lines to the player
NPC
Class of NPC actors
PickUpCurrencyAction
Action to pick up currency
Player
Class representing the Player.
PowerStar
PowerStar class that extends abstract class SpecialItem Capabilities: Makes consumer Invincible
ResetAction
Special Action for Resetting the map.
ResetManager
A global Singleton manager that does soft-reset on the instances.
Resettable
This class represents the interface to be implemented by all objects that are intended to be resetted
Sapling
Tree's second stage
SpecialItem
Class of Special items that implements interface TradeableItem Items that give the consumer special capabilities
Sprout
Tree's first stage
SuicideBehaviour
This class represents the suicidal tendency that can be incorporated into an Actor to cause random instant death
SuperMushroom
SuperMushroom class that extends abstract class SpecialItem Capabilities: Increases max HP by 50, allows actor to jump with 100% success rate
TalkAction
Special Action for communicating (talking) with other Actors.
Toad
Class of a Toad that extends NPC class
TradeableItem
Interface for all tradeable items
TradeAction
Trade Action sells tradeable item
TradeManager
This class manages all tradeable items that can be traded
Tree
Tree parent class to sprout, sapling, mature
Wall
Wall, a high ground
Wallet
Wallet class that extends abstract class item
WalletManager
This class manages all wallets and their owners
WanderBehaviour
This class represents the behaviour of wandering around aimlessly
Wrench
Wrench class that extends abstract class SpecialItem Capabilities: Lets consumer hit enemies with more damage and break Koopa shells
